subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Amazing All-Band Receiver
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Interesting idea!

A 1N5711 should be good through about 3.5 GHz. Not that the BNC connector
used will allow much of that to come through. But I doubt if anyone
here cares if it goes THAT high or not.

Zack
